hero.headline: Powerful Features for Modern Direct Mail
hero.subheadline: Everything you need to create, send, and track highly effective direct mail campaigns with the power of artificial intelligence.

coreFeatures.title: Core Features
coreFeatures.subtitle: Discover the powerful capabilities that make Enclosed.AI the leading choice for intelligent direct mail marketing

features.title: AI-Powered Personalization
features.description: Our advanced AI analyzes each recipient's profile, preferences, and behavior patterns to generate highly personalized sales letters. Every letter is unique, crafted to speak directly to the recipient's needs, interests, and pain points. This level of personalization typically increases response rates by 300-500% compared to generic direct mail campaigns.
details: Dynamic content generation based on recipient data
Behavioral pattern analysis for optimal timing

features.title: Advanced Campaign Management
features.description: Create, manage, and optimize your direct mail campaigns with our intuitive dashboard. Schedule campaigns, A/B test different approaches, and track performance in real-time. Our platform handles everything from list management to delivery confirmation, giving you complete control over your marketing efforts.

features.title: Real-Time Analytics & Reporting
features.description: Track every aspect of your campaign performance with detailed analytics and reporting. Monitor delivery rates, response rates, ROI, and customer engagement metrics. Our comprehensive reporting helps you understand what's working and optimize future campaigns for maximum impact.

features.title: Seamless Integrations
features.description: Connect Enclosed.AI with your existing marketing stack and business tools. Our platform integrates with popular CRM systems, email marketing platforms, analytics tools, and more. Sync your customer data, automate workflows, and maintain consistency across all your marketing channels.

advancedFeatures.title: Advanced Features
advancedFeatures.subtitle: Powerful tools and capabilities that give you complete control over your direct mail marketing

features.title: Smart List Management
features.description: Advanced list segmentation, deduplication, and data enrichment to ensure your campaigns reach the right people at the right time.

features.title: Quality Assurance
features.description: Automated quality checks, compliance verification, and proofing tools to ensure every piece of mail meets the highest standards.

features.title: Flexible Pricing
features.description: Pay-per-use pricing with volume discounts, no monthly fees, and transparent costs that scale with your business needs.

features.title: Enterprise Security
features.description: Bank-level security, SOC 2 compliance, and advanced data protection to keep your customer information safe and secure.

features.title: Global Delivery
features.description: Send mail anywhere in the world with our network of trusted delivery partners and real-time tracking capabilities.

features.title: 24/7 Support
features.description: Dedicated customer success team available around the clock to help you maximize your direct mail marketing results.
